title: Joash Repairs the Temple
summary: King Joash reigns in Judah and orders repairs to the temple. He ensures funds are collected and used faithfully. However, later in life, Joash turns from God, and after being wounded in an attack, he is assassinated by his own officials.

faq.question: What major project did Joash oversee?
faq.answer: He repaired the temple of the Lord.

faq.answer: He was assassinated by his servants after turning away from God.
